Name: The Puzzle Factory
About the game: The Puzzle Factory is a 3 in 1 puzzle game including Wordsearches, Crosswords, Maths Platformer, and more suprises! Featuring relaxing music, engaging and problem solving gameplay and beautiful HD Full Motion Video elements and packing a huge amount of value. No ads, no fuss, just one great game, accessible for all ages. -Over 40 Crosswords to have fun and challenge your brain with! -20 Picture Slide Puzzles with nice feelings! -Over 10 Maths challenge modes featuring a cat with a jetpack just for extra enjoyment!
